title: Drawing, "Studies: Irises", early 20th century
medium: Pen and ink, traces of graphite and watercolor on yellow tracing paper
inscribed:
(according to catalogue card): manuscript notation along bottom margin.

recto: S. L. Crownfield (inscribed by her sister, Gertrude) / No. 13 / S. L. Crownfield
creditline: Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney
description: Horizontal sheet illustrating six studies of iris, three of which are colored with white, yellow, green and violet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Studies: Irises", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Pen and ink, traces of graphite and watercolor on yellow tracing paper. Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney. 1937-59-37.
